question: ‘Sardarpur wildlife sanctuary’ is located in which district of Madhya Pradesh?
explanation:
The Sardarpur Sanctuary is located in Dhar district of Madhya Pradesh.It was notified in the year 1983. The Sanctuary encloses area upto 348 sq. km.
Kharmour and other birds are among the fauna properly found at the Sanctuary. The Kharmour bird is mostly seen during the months of July to October here.
